name: M2C2 Communications
tag_list: project-management, mobile-applications, brochures, flyers, cms, communications, conseils-internet, conseils-web, content-management, content-management-system, extranet, flash, gestion, gestion-de-contenu, gestion-de-projet, imprimes, internet, intranet
overview: Founded in 2004 and specialized in website development, M2C2 Communications offers a full suite of services from design to Web ergonomics and interactive marketing (such as marketing advertising on the internet). We can also build a simple website or provide an e-commerce solution using innovative technology based upon current and newly introduced programming. If you are looking for a turnkey solution or would perhaps consider M2C2 as a multilingual sub-contractor, then please visit our website @ www.m2c2communications.com, or click on our most recent creations: http://www.vimadesign.com http://www.omia.fr http://www.aeromag2000.com
